page.title: 15RECREATION IN BOURNE
page.content: Most Sports are held on the{Abbey} {Lawns,}one of the most attractive grounds in Lincolnshire. Teams have gained a high reputation.Abbey Lawns were developed by{Bourne United } {Charities}and are maintained by them.County and local Cricket matches are held here as are matches for the Hodgkinson Cup Knock-out competition. Bourne Town Football Club,The Wakes, and Bourne Men's Hockey Club draw a crowd every Saturday afternoon in the season.The Tennis Club,Town and Abbey Bowling Clubs and putting green use the Lawn facilities,Sports Pavilion and Club house. The{Memorial Gardens}and the Well Head Park also created by United Charities are lovely open spaces. Near the Abbey Lawns is an outdoor swimming pool. Kesteven District Council maintain the pool.
